scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --target web && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='pkg/index.js';const c='export * from \"./conway_wasm.js\";\nexport { default as init } from \"./conway_wasm.js\";\n';fs.existsSync('pkg')&&fs.writeFileSync(p,c);console.log('✅ pkg/index.js 생성됨');"
scripts.build:wasm:dev: wasm-pack build --target web --dev && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='pkg/index.js';const c='export * from \"./conway_wasm.js\";\nexport { default as init } from \"./conway_wasm.js\";\n';fs.existsSync('pkg')&&fs.writeFileSync(p,c);console.log('✅ pkg/index.js 생성됨');"
scripts.start: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 3000 -o
